content: twist and shout for democracy tekyarn sock #4🧦 these socks were created by following mela s sockenmuster #53 and basic sock pattern ideas from ann budd s getting started knitting socks the sample was knit with mudpunch yarn on size 2 5 needles roughly 8 stitches/inch in stockinette and roughly 6 stitches/inch in pattern the pattern stitch is super stretchy so please do a gauge swatch i found this to be a quick potato-chippy knit #melasstrickstube #mudpunch #annbuddknits co 64 with size 2 5 needles or size needed to obtain gauge mudpunch is a heavy fingering weight sock yarn work k1 tbl p1 ribbing for 1 5 inches or length desired knit one row and decrease evenly down to 52 st pattern stitch row 1 3 5 7 9 11 k all row 2 p all row 4 6 8 10 yo sl1 kw k1 psso row 12 k all repeat row 1-12 until desired length sample= 6 repeats for a 7 inch cuff heel flap row 1 sl1 k1 for 32 st row 2 sl1 pwwyif p to end repeat row 1-2 until 32 row have been knit turn heel row 1 rs k18 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl1pw p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1pw k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1pw p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 4 until all heel sts have been worked gusset k across heel sts pick up and knit 17 st k across 20 instep stitches pick up and knit 17 stitches k 9 stitches round now begins at center back heal rearrange stitches such that 32 stitches now are on the instep=needle 2 you may continue the instep in pattern round1 needle 1 k to last 3 st k2tog k1 needle 2 k across needle 3 k1 ssk k round2 k repeat round 1 2 until 64 st remain knit until sock is 2-2 25 inches shorter than desired length 8 toe round 1 needle 1 k to last 3 st k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk work to last 3 st k2tog k2 needle 3 k1 ssk k to end round 2 k repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 32 st remain repeat round 1 only until 12 st remain finish cut yarn with an 18 in tail and kitchener stitch the remaining 12 st weave in the ends block if desired
